titleStmt.title: A collection of the choicest epigrams and characters of Richard Flecknoe being rather a new work, then [sic] a new impression of the old.
titleStmt.author: Flecknoe, Richard, d. 1678?

notesStmt.note: Part. 2 has special t.p. with title: Characters made at several times on several occasions.
Copy at 29:8 is part 1 only; copy at 211:3 is parts 1 and 2.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library (pt. 1) and Huntington Library (pts. 1-2).
